replies.body: Good luck boiz! Representing Oce proud! wish you all the best.
Damn why does it stream at midnight really want to watch it but thats kinda late

I hear you. The time is because it's hosted in Istanbul, Turkey, in their primetime and it converts to late at night/early morning for us. The VODS will go up on https://www.youtube.com/user/RiotGamesOceania/videos so you can watch when you can
Is there a possibility of a delayed streamed cast by the OPL casters?
Going to be live broadcast by the OPL casters, so VOD's will have you covered there!
Swiffer played against ambition and won? I would like to see this. Not becuase I don't believe, I just cant seem to find any mention of it anywhere but here D=
this was at World Cyber Games in 2013. This was held in China. The game was casted in English as well as chinese. I can confirm that Swiffer killed ambition in mid as I was there to see it live

It was at a WCG even, 2013 I believe.
Edit: Found the video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m-l45I8aScI

your not very positive for the top team in the OCE
personally i think they have a huge chance at winning this

So if you look at their last picks you can see their set teams of Lucian, Aniv, Sion, Elise, Janna and Sivir, TF, Irealia, Gragas, Naut. I'm sure teams are already looking at this so I hope they have a few more hidden. Hope they keep practicing, they're honestly the dark horse if anyone. Personally I want to see them go far. :D So good luck guys
these guys should be killed asap!!!!!
This is why i have there icon :)
sucks there all on so late here in aus but i think ill watch game 1 to supports league in oce show them what we got boys
"make Australia proud" all respect for Raydere lost, your not the only OCE country that plays. other then that, GO CHIEFS!

I don't think that what he said is disrespectful in anyway. All five of these players are from Australia so they have the right to represent their nation and be proud of it. I'm perfectly fine with what he said, even though I'm not from Australia, they've definitely earned it.
All Australian team and their not allowed to say they want to make their country proud? Get it together Eshade!!
